name: Vptree
tagline: Different implementations of vptree and exploiting parallellism in construction of vantage point trees for metric spaces.
body:
### Introduction
This project is a part of my undergraduate thesis at Risk Analytics Lab, Dalhousie University
* Exploiting parallelism in Barnes-Hut-SNE and Vantage Point Tree.
* Performance evaluation of Tree construction on Intel MIC and Nvidia's GPUs.

### Cloning Repo
```
$ git clone https://github.com/priyankt68/vptree.git
$ cd vptree
```
### Author
This work developed by Priyank Trivedi (@priyankt68)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
